page.title: 13Clubs in Linwood
page.content: The{Twilight Club}is one of the clubs in{Linwood}.It is a{Junior Youth Club} for youngsters aged from 5-12.It has been open since{1976}and is part of {Strathclyde Regional Council}.The Twilight Club offers the following activities-snooker,pool,badminton, darts and table games.A disco and breakdancing hall are also part of this scheme.Outdoor games include crazy golf and rounders.The club has a membership of over 100.Membership costs 50p per year and entrance fee is 10p.It is open from 6.00pm-8.00pm on a Tuesday & 5.30pm-7.15pm on a Wednesday in the Red School in Linwood.3 adults and 7 teenagers are needed to run the club.The children go on 3 or 4 outings each year to Youth Hostels around{ {Scotland}.The Twilight Club is very popular in Linwood.
